name: Notion Finance Tracker
description: Simplify your finances with NotionTake control of your finances and achieve your financial goals. The Finance Tracker Notion template makes it easy to keep track of your finances and gain a clear understanding of your financial situation.Categorize your income and expenses so you can monitor your spending at every level. The template is fully customizable, allowing you to adapt it to your personal needs and preferences. You can even add notes, attach receipts, and export the data for tax season.
features: What is Notion?Notion is a free project management and note-taking software that offers an unparalleled level of customization.
